Results for

ViroView

public interface ViroView

com.viro.renderer.jni.ViroView
Known Indirect Subclasses
ViroGvrLayout,ViroOvrView,ViroViewARCore
ViroGvrLayout Custom Android view encapsulating all GvrLayout setup and initialization for displaying a VR view. 
ViroOvrView  
ViroViewARCore Class for instantiating an AR Viro view. 

Summary

Public methods

abstract void destroy()
abstract View getContentView()
abstract String getController()
abstract String getHeadset()
abstract String getPlatform()

abstract void setDebugHUDEnabled(boolean enabled)
abstract void setScene(Scene scene)
abstract void setVrModeEnabled(boolean vrModeEnabled)
